vision.presidentText: The new presidency of the University of Antananarivo has chosen the slogan 'Think Global, Act National' as the guiding principle that will carry all the University's policies and actions. Thus, the communication strategy, as well as its operational translation, will revolve around this. The University of Antananarivo is committed to its values of modernity at the forefront of technology. It connects to the world by all means. It is among the leaders in the field of training and research. With this in mind, it develops training programs adapted to the real needs of society. The University of Antananarivo, being a gathering of intellectuals, remains a voice that is heard in public debates. It remains a global academic reference thanks to its partners and alumni.
